thread.title: OK, How Freakin' Cute Is Young Randall From This Is Us?
thread.title_full: OK, How Freakin' Cute Is Young Randall From This Is Us?

author: Brittney Stephens
title: OK, How Freakin' Cute Is Young Randall From This Is Us?
text:
Lonnie Chavis at the 2017 People's Choice Awards OK, How Freakin' Cute Is Young Randall From This Is Us? January 18, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 OK, How Freakin' Cute Is Young Randall From This Is Us? 
One of the first people on the People's Choice Awards red carpet also happened to be the cutest. Lonnie Chavis, who plays young Randall Pearson (Sterling K. Brown's character) on the hit NBC series This Is Us , showed up for his very first award show looking adorably dapper in a gray suit jacket, metallic pants, cool kicks, and a bow tie. Eight-year-old Lonnie shared an Instagram photo of himself arriving in a limo with Khloe Thompson , a 9-year-old girl who went viral last year after launching her own charity, Khloe Kares , and passing out homemade bags of necessities for homeless people in her community. What a cute little date night, right? 
Luckily for us, the show, which has been making fans ugly-cry since its premiere, was just renewed for seasons two and three at NBC — so we'll hopefully get to see more flashbacks featuring little Lonnie in the near future. Related:
